detail_desc: Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed, elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short top in airy, ribbed jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and a twisted detail at the hem.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elasticated tops.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Mittens in a soft cable knit with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.

Quilted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a hook and loop fastening. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top, side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Fleece lining. Polyester filling.
Short kimono in woven fabric with dropped shoulders, wide 3/4-length sleeves and slits in the sides. No fasteners.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Hi-tops in imitation leather with decorative metal studs, a padded tongue, lacing at the front with a metal charm and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Thin metal chain anklets, one in ball chain, one with metal beads and one with glass beads. Adjustable length 22-25.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with a round neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Padded hat in woven fabric with an appliqué at the top.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Alice band in plastic covered in patterned satin with a decorative bow on the top.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket, 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in quilted jersey with a zip down the front, small stand-up collar with a press-stud, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, ribbed bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back. Wide elastic side stripes and matching elastication at the waist.
Metal rings in various designs. Three of the rings have a plastic stone.
Sleeveless, flared V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a rounded hem. The polyester content of the tunic is partly recycled.

Suit trousers woven in a linen blend with an extended waistband, zip fly and button, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and turn-ups. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides with decorative straps, and a string back.
Single-breasted jacket in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a slight sheen. Patch front pockets. Lined at the back.
KELZUKI x H&M. Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dresses in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Heart-shaped shoulder bag in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Zip at the top and a grosgrain shoulder strap. Lined. Size approx. 13x14 cm.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered block heels and a zip in one side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx 7.5 cm.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.4 cm to 1.4 cm.
Sandals with cork wedge heels and heel straps that are elasticated at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 11 cm.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Platform trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves. Small, overlocked frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted cardigan in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and eyelet buttoning down the front. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey vest tops in a narrow cut at the top with a flare top the hem. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Boots in imitation leather made from recycled polyester and Piñatex® with a metallic coating. Patterned, jacquard-weave sections, square toes and a loop at the back. Recycled polyester linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx 6 cm. Piñatex® is an innovative natural material made from pineapple leaf ﬁbres. The leaves are a byproduct of existing agriculture, turned into a non-woven material that can be used as an alternative to leather.
Pool shoes with a plastic foot strap and moulded soles that are patterned underneath. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
Jacket in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short shorts in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated waist, small frill trim at the top, large patch pockets at the sides and wide legs.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
Cap in a cotton blend with a small embroidered detail and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit containing some wool with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short, straight dress in crinkled chiffon with an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs. Lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft wool blend containing glittery threads with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a fine, sturdy knit with low dropped shoulders, balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and ribbing at the neckline and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and hat in soft cotton. Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Hat in double-layered jersey.
Block-patterned scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes along the short sides.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with pattern-knit sections and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short lace dress with short sleeves, a lace section with an opening at the back, and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and a slightly higher shaft at the heels for best fit.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Small V-neck opening with ties at the front, a flounce at the top, and narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Fully lined print-patterned bikini. Top with frills on the shoulder straps.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend.
Cropped top in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps and ties that fasten into a bow at the back. Lined.

Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Draped nursing blouse in patterned satin with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a raw-edge neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket and rounded hem.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline with a wide flounce. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.

Thin jacket in soft cotton twill with a detachable hood and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, yoke with a pleat at the back and patch pockets with appliqués and a glittery print. Elasticated cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lined.

Whooli Chen x H&M. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton and recycled polyester with a print motif and soft brushed inside. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, soft, elasticated, drawstring waist, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
